activities.name: SURFING AT EAST BAY
activities.description: Surfing on Asia’s islands offers warm waters, epic waves, and stunning views. From Bali to Siargao, each spot has unique charm, perfect for all skill levels. A true paradise for surfers!

activities.name: HIKING AT REDWOODS
activities.description: Hiking on Asia’s islands offers breathtaking trails, lush jungles, and stunning mountain views. From Bali to Taiwan, each route has its own charm, perfect for adventurers of all levels. A true paradise for hikers!

activities.name: DISCOVERING CULTURE
activities.description: Exploring Asia’s islands offers a deep dive into rich traditions, local cuisine, and vibrant communities. From ancient temples to lively festivals, each destination provides a unique cultural experience that connects past and present.
